mapper.sql: inquire_num as inquireNum, student_num as studentNum, emp_num as empNum, teacher_num as teacherNum, inquire_name as inquireName, inquire_category as inquireCategory, inquire_date as inquireDate, inquire_answer as inquireAnswer, inquire_answer_date as inquireAnswerDate, inquire_contents as inquireContents
